entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
